official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include service during World War II in the United States merchant marine as military service for purposes of the civil service retirement system.

summary.text: Includes service in the U.S. merchant marine between May 26, 1940, and January 1, 1948, as military service for purposes of provisions concerning the determination of civil service retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include service during World War II in the United States merchant marine as military service for purposes of the civil service retirement system.
